title: Mouse scroll lock F9
body:
Hi,

I was annoyed by the fact that the camera scrolled, when I reached the borders of the screen, so I disabled Mouse scroll lock (F9).
Now I have a red border around my screen. Is there any way to remove this?

Thanks
unceremonious

replies.body: I did some asking around to see if I could figure out a way to get that red outline to go away, but at the moment it doesn't look like there is any way to disable it other than turning mouse scroll lock back on =\ .
